name: Sebastian Lukasz Nowak
profile_summary:
As a Senior Reliability Engineer with 8 years of experience, I bring a strong background in design and implementation of safety standards and technical specifications in the railway engineering domain. My proven skills in risk assessments, problem-solving, and effective communication enable me to lead projects efficiently while collaborating with teams to ensure compliance with industry standards.
I excel in mentorship, guiding junior engineers to elevate their capabilities and contribute to high-performance solutions. My technical expertise includes leveraging modern frameworks and technologies within full-stack development, such as **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, complemented by significant experience with cloud services like **Azure** and **AWS**.
Additionally, I have deep knowledge in building and integrating complex systems with microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, ensuring robust applications that adhere to strict compliance standards. My work includes developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, enhancing operational reliability and predictive analytics capabilities.
